title: [Proposal] remove low-security serializers that are no longer maintained
description:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

fst and hessian are no longer maintained and do not support jdk17 and above, which is a huge problem for our future maintenance and security, I propose to remove these two serialization extensions on the 2.x branch

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

If there is an exception, please attach the exception trace:

Just paste your stack trace here!

Ⅲ. Describe what you expected to happen

Ⅳ. How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)

  2. xxx
  3. xxx
